message: @slack-Main_Account-incidents-data: Please monitor the {{location.name}} BigQuery capacity dashboard and sort out why commitments, reservations, and assignments haven't been properly filed and utilized. This will likely require us to manually create flat-rate resources and adjust the Terraform for automation: https://joinhandshake.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/DA/pages/2704769103/BigQuery+Flatrate+Reservations
name: BigQuery Reservations haven't rolled out successfully for {{location.name}}
